extendedInfo.description: Gain a mastery of French!French Class contains a complete offline written French course, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises. All words and phrases are available to listen to as well.Great support when you learn French. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary,  grammar and phrases with.This total course covers the following content:* All tenses, with all irregular verb forms highlighted* 4000+ words, sorted into different categories such as food, transport and vacation* 40 grammar articles, covering all French Grammar* 200 useful phrasesAnd the following features:* Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises.â¨* Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made.The first strength of this app is the extended content. No other French app offers this much for the same price. The other strength lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises.The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox.If you are serious about learning French, this app is for you.IMPORTANT!We believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating.Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech.SOME COMPLIMENTS WE FOUND IN OUR MAILBOXYour language apps rock!! The interface is well designed, simple yet very very effective and it is as you described, very addictive.Your language apps are the best on the market. You offer far more for less. Unbelievable! I'm blown away by this app. It's almost as good as my pc version that I paid $$$ for except voice recognition could be better. Definitely worth the money.Perfect format. I like how quickly you jump on comments. Keep up the good work.PLANNED UPDATES* Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a âwritingâ instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge.â¨* Image exercises, such as on clock times.* Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com.

reviews.comment: Ok app, probably not worth buying as it\'s quite limited in its grammar reference. It\'s doesn\'t even show how to construct the future tense!
reviews.author: Paul Armstrong

reviews.comment: Keeps crashing on Nexus 7
reviews.author: Mark Boutros

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I had my doubts at first as i wasn\'t sure if it would help me. This app is fantastic! ive been living in France for almost 6 months now and this app has helped cater to my french that im not even sure my actual french classes have... And thats saying something!!! I couldn\'t recomend this more- defo get this :)
reviews.author: Nrd.y girl

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: I recommend it.  A good way to continue learning the language while one is away from printed material or computer.  The audio features are very helpful although not always precise.
reviews.author: Nestor Calderon

reviews.title: Useful neat little app! ... Not without its flaws, but who is?
reviews.comment: Overall a very nice app.  Some minor glitches when displaying answers...  And one wrong grammar answer.  A very useful app for any intermediate french speaker who wants to solidify his/here\'s grammar!   The grammar explanations are very rudimentary though and you will need other grammar books or such to help you find/understand the right answers !   And I like the cute teacher ;-) :-) ......  Only I would really appreciate the addition of an easy way to provide feedback in the paid version!!
reviews.author: Tormen Traubstein

reviews.title: Great reference app.
reviews.comment: Does what it says!
reviews.author: Mark Hauer

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Excellent tool to assist with my French course
reviews.author: Edwin Hanson

reviews.comment: V useful App
reviews.author: usama sayed

reviews.comment: Excellent app with excellent and prompt support.
reviews.author: Trevor Jones

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.comment: The grammar tests are horrible, they test things not mentioned in the lessons.
reviews.author: Geo Froy

reviews.comment: Excellent app for reviewing grammar.
reviews.author: S Turn

reviews.title: All round excellent
reviews.comment: Fantastic app, and developers. Within 2 hours of identifying a problem the developers had contacted me and fixed it, very impressive service. Would recommend app and developers to anyone wanting to learn a language.
reviews.author: Stephen Burnett

reviews.title: Problematic app
reviews.comment: The app\'s content is great but it doesnt work properly. Many issues upon start-up and app closes automatically in the middle of a session. Developers are slow to respond to me about my issue but quick to take my money for purchase.
reviews.author: Joshua Brantley

reviews.title: Impressive!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It is the first COMPLETE app I have found. Well worth much more than it costs. Combine with free podcasts from \"Coffee Break French\" to listen in the car or gym and you will be fluent in no time!!!
reviews.author: Justin Gould

reviews.comment: Great app, spans both vocabulary and grammar. Good exercises. Things I miss: more vocabulary words and a guided grammar course.
reviews.author: Wouter Cox

reviews.title: Its a challenge
reviews.comment: I complete a section of the quiz per day and I am surprised at how many words I did not know. Michel Thomas said you only need in any language between 600 & 700 words to be fluent. With the help of this App I will reach that target.
reviews.author: John Kelly

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I am very impressed with the amount of information this app has. It will surely help me a lot!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: didn\'t deliver what they have promised.
reviews.comment: says it comes with 200 phrases but has only 127. mailed them as well but no response so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Convenient!
reviews.comment: I can use as little or as much as I feel to study  I go to this lesson more than the others I downloaded
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It a good app but the French pronunciation is terrible, they must get a proper French person to pronounce the words and phrases
reviews.author: A Google User
